name: Material Theme Builder
description:
Visualize dynamic color and create a custom Material Theme

Dynamic color is an algorithmic feature of Material Design 3 that takes an individual's wallpaper or predefined color as the starting point and generates a complete light and dark color scheme that’s accessible by default.


Visualize dynamic color in your UI

Select an image or color to visualize dynamic color in your UI. Material Theme Builder utilizes design tokens available in the new Material 3 Design Kit


Generate a custom theme

Build a custom Material Theme, allowing you to migrate to Material Design 3’s new color system, and export it to code. 


Explore dynamic color

Want to learn more? Try out our Design lab. 

Visit m3.material.io for more information about dynamic color.


Learn more about the Material Theme Builder material.io/material-theme-builder

Suggestions or feedback? Ping us @materialdesign on Twitter.
